summary: The customer service agent provided the customer with information about product streaming on Contoso Wireless. The customer learned that they can stream movies, music, and other content by logging into their account and selecting the product streaming option. They also learned that if they are looking for something specific, they can search for it in the library or through third-party partners. Furthermore, the customer was informed that there is no limit to how much they can stream and that they should keep their device up-to-date with the latest software and security updates before beginning any streams. Lastly, the agent reminded them that customer service is available to help with any issues or questions.
